name: backend

name: setForeground

desc: Flushes any buffered content to the terminal screen.

name: writer

name: Grid

desc: Returns the area of the grid as a rectangle with an optional offset.

desc: Cells in the grid.

desc: Creates a new grid from the given rows.

name: Grid.generate
desc: Creates a new grid with the given width and height.

desc: Returns the cell at the given x and y coordinates.

name: height
desc: Height of the buffer.

name: indexed
desc: Each cell in the grid with its x and y coordinates.

name: rows
desc: Each row of cells in the grid from top to bottom.

name: set
desc: Sets the cell at the given x and y coordinates to cell.

name: subGrid
desc: Returns a sub-grid view into this grid within the given bounds.

name: Grid.view
desc: Creates a sub-grid view into this grid within the given bounds.

name: width
desc: Width of the buffer.

name: ListGrid

desc: Creates a new grid with the given width and height.

name: cells
desc: Cells in the grid.

desc: Creates an empty grid with no cells.

desc: Creates a new grid with the given width and height.

name: get
desc: Returns the cell at the given x and y coordinates.

name: height
desc: Height of the buffer.

name: set
desc: Sets the cell at the given x and y coordinates to cell.

name: width
desc: Width of the buffer.

name: Offset
desc: A 2D offset relative to the top left corner of a coordinate space.

desc: Returns this offset incremented by the provided other offset.

name: operator -
desc: Returns this offset decremented by the provided other offset.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: Offset
desc: Creates a new offset.

desc: Compares this object to another object.

desc: Creates a new offset from a coordinate pair (x, y).

desc: The hash code for this object.

name: toPair
desc: Returns a pair (x, y) of this offset.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: x
desc: X-coordinate of this offset.

name: y
desc: Y-coordinate of this offset.

name: zero
desc: The zero offset, or origin.

name: Rect
desc: A rectangular area defined by its top-left corner (x, y) and dimensions.

name: operator &
desc: Returns a union of this rectangle and other.

name: operator ==
desc: The equality operator.

name: area
desc: The area of the rectangle.

name: bottom
desc: The bottom edge of this rectangle on the y-axis.

name: bottomLeft
desc: The bottom-left corner of this rectangle.

name: bottomRight
desc: The bottom-right corner of this rectangle.

name: clamp
desc: Clamps this rectangle to fit within the given bounds.

name: contains
desc: Returns whether this rectangle contains the given offset.

name: containsRect
desc: Returns whether this rectangle contains the given rect.

name: copyWith
desc: Returns a copy of this rectangle with the given arguments replaced.

name: Rect.fromLTWH
desc: Creates a new rectangle.

name: Rect.fromSize
desc: Creates a new rectangle of width and height with a default origin.

name: hashCode
desc: The hash code for this object.

name: height
desc: Height of this rectangle.

name: intersect
desc: Returns an intersection of this rectangle and other.

name: intersects
desc: Returns whether this rectangle intersects with other.

name: isEmpty
desc: Whether the rectangle is empty (has no area).

name: isNotEmpty
desc: Whether the rectangle is not empty (has area).

name: left
desc: The left edge of this rectangle on the x-axis.

name: offsets
desc: Iterable of all offsets within this rectangle.

name: right
desc: The right edge of this rectangle on the x-axis.

name: toString
desc: A string representation of this object.

name: top
desc: The top edge of this rectangle on the y-axis.

name: topLeft
desc: The top-left corner of this rectangle.

name: topRight
desc: The top-right corner of this rectangle.

name: union
desc: Returns a rectangle that contains both this rectangle and other.

name: width
desc: Width of this rectangle.

name: withOffset
desc: Returns a rectangle with a new offset without modifying its size.

name: x
desc: X-coordinate of the top-left corner of this rectangle.

name: y
desc: Y-coordinate of the top-left corner of this rectangle.

name: zero
desc: A zero-sized rectangle at the origin.

name: operator |
desc: Returns an intersection of this rectangle and other.

desc: Writes the provided bytes to the sink, optionally with offsets.

name: Spacing
desc: Defines spacing insets for edges of a box.

desc: The equality operator.

desc: Creates spacing where all the offsets are the same.

desc: The hash code for this object.
